payload.name: failure-domains-define-correlated-risk-schedule-with-failure-domain-awareness
payload.title: Failure domains define correlated risk; schedule with failure-domain awareness
payload.formal: correlated failures violate independence assumptions; replication must straddle domains.
payload.apm2_mapping: for consensus and evidence replication, spread across domains (rack, ToR switch, power feed). For work scheduling, avoid placing all parents/children in same failure domain.
